**Definition Of Done**

| Q                                 | A
| --------------------------------- | ---
| Technical Review and 2 GTM        | Todo
| English Review and 1 GTM          | Todo


`Todo`: Pending / Work in progress
`OK`: Done / Validated
`-`: Not needed
